  • NOKIA X30 5G AND G60 5G SMARTPHONES UNVEILED AT IFA 2022: PRICE, SPECIFICATIONS

    https://www.news18.com/news/tech/nokia-x30-5g-and-g60-5g-smartphones-unveiled-at-ifa-2022-price-specifications-5870197.html

    09/01/2022, 21:17

    61.11% Shortened!

    Nokia X30 5G starts from $530 (Rs 42,000 approx) for the base model

    Nokia G60 5G smartphone will be available from $320 (Rs 25,500 approx) in the market

    Nokia is the latest to drop the charger out of the box

    Nokia G60 5G has a 6.58-inch LCD display but with support for 120Hz refresh rate

    Nokia X30 5G has dual cameras at the back with a 50-megapixel primary sensor (OIS) and a 13-megapixel ultra-wide-angle sensor

    The front of the phone carries a 16-megapixel shooter

    With the Nokia G60 you get the less-capable 50-megapixel sensor without OIS, and a 5-megapixel ultra-wide sensor, along with a depth sensor

    ['nokia', 'phone', 'x30', 'g60', 'megapixel']

    Nokia X30 5G starts from $530 (Rs 42,000 approx) for the base model

    Nokia G60 5G smartphone will be available from $320 (Rs 25,500 approx) in the market

    Nokia is the latest to drop the charger out of the box

    Nokia G60 5G has a 6.58-inch LCD display but with support for 120Hz refresh rate

    Nokia X30 5G has dual cameras at the back with a 50-megapixel primary sensor (OIS) and a 13-megapixel ultra-wide-angle sensor

    The front of the phone carries a 16-megapixel shooter

    With the Nokia G60 you get the less-capable 50-megapixel sensor without OIS, and a 5-megapixel ultra-wide sensor, along with a depth sensor

  • FAMITSU SALES: 8/22/22 - 8/28/22

    https://www.gematsu.com/2022/09/famitsu-sales-8-22-22-8-28-22

    09/01/2022, 21:10

    45.45% Shortened!

    Famitsu has published its estimated physical game software and hardware sales data for Japan for the week of August 22, 2022 to August 28, 2022

    Earth Defense Force 6 was the highest selling new release, moving 68,341 copies on PlayStation 4 and 24,363 copies on PlayStation 5 for an opening week total of 92,704 copies sold

    SD Gundam Battle Alliance followed at 38,634 copies sold on Switch, 17,950 copies on PlayStation 4, and 9,625 copies on PlayStation 5 for an opening week total of 66,209 retail sales

    Soul Hackers 2 opened at 31,604 copies sold on PlayStation 4 and 20,257 copies on PlayStation 5 for a total of 51,861 retail sales

    On the hardware side, the Switch family sold 113,530 units, the PlayStation 5 family sold 25,109 units, the Xbox Series family sold 16,726 units, and the PlayStation 4 family sold 15 units

    Software Sales (followed by lifetime sales) Rankings 11 to 30 will be announced on September 2

    ['sale', 'sell', 'copy', 'playstation', 'family']

    Famitsu has published its estimated physical game software and hardware sales data for Japan for the week of August 22, 2022 to August 28, 2022

    Earth Defense Force 6 was the highest selling new release, moving 68,341 copies on PlayStation 4 and 24,363 copies on PlayStation 5 for an opening week total of 92,704 copies sold

    SD Gundam Battle Alliance followed at 38,634 copies sold on Switch, 17,950 copies on PlayStation 4, and 9,625 copies on PlayStation 5 for an opening week total of 66,209 retail sales

    Soul Hackers 2 opened at 31,604 copies sold on PlayStation 4 and 20,257 copies on PlayStation 5 for a total of 51,861 retail sales

    On the hardware side, the Switch family sold 113,530 units, the PlayStation 5 family sold 25,109 units, the Xbox Series family sold 16,726 units, and the PlayStation 4 family sold 15 units

    Software Sales (followed by lifetime sales) Rankings 11 to 30 will be announced on September 2

    ['sale', 'sell', 'copy', 'playstation', 'family']



  • UBISOFT DELAY DECOMMISSIONING OF OLD ASSASSIN‚ÄôS CREED GAMES

    https://www.dualshockers.com/ubisoft-delay-decommissioning-of-old-assassins-creed-games/

    09/01/2022, 21:04

    45.45% Shortened!

    The decommissioning date has been extended by one month

    By Kyle Knight Ubisoft has announced that they will be delaying the decommissioning of older Assassin‚Äôs Creed titles by one month, reportedly due to the publisher wanting to ‚Äúreduce disruption‚Äù for their player base

    The decommissioning of older Ubisoft titles was due to take place on the 1st of September 2022, but has now been moved back by one month, to the 1st of October 2022

    As a result, the team has reportedly been forced to move the decommission date to the beginning of October, in order to make the process as smooth as possible for those still playing older titles

    The publisher did express that DLC for single-player titles on PC, such as Assassin‚Äôs Creed Brotherhood,¬†Assassin‚Äôs Creed III¬†(2012 release),¬†Far Cry 3¬†and¬†Splinter Cell Blacklist, will still be available to download and keep before the decommission date

    Ubisoft also states, ‚ÄúThere will be no impact to the same single-player DLC on consoles, and you will continue to be able to download and play them after 1 October 2022‚Äù

    ['decommission', 'ubisoft', 'old', 'title', 'player']

    The decommissioning date has been extended by one month

    The decommissioning of older Ubisoft titles was due to take place on the 1st of September 2022, but has now been moved back by one month, to the 1st of October 2022

    As a result, the team has reportedly been forced to move the decommission date to the beginning of October, in order to make the process as smooth as possible for those still playing older titles

    The publisher did express that DLC for single-player titles on PC, such as Assassin‚Äôs Creed Brotherhood,¬†Assassin‚Äôs Creed III¬†(2012 release),¬†Far Cry 3¬†and¬†Splinter Cell Blacklist, will still be available to download and keep before the decommission date

  • FIRST OLED IPAD EXPECTED TO USE HYBRID SCREEN TO AVOID VISIBLE WARPING

    https://9to5mac.com/2022/09/01/first-oled-ipad/

    09/01/2022, 20:04

    80.0% Shortened!

    The first OLED screens were rigid ones, with a glass substrate

    The Elec reports that Apple is likely to use a hybrid form of OLED for iPads, for this reason

    Apple is expected to use ‚Äòhybrid‚Äô OLED panels in its first OLED iPad that it will launch a few years from now, TheElec has learned

    Hybrid OLED panels refer to OLED panels that use both rigid OLED panel and flexible OLED panel technologies [‚Ä¶] A hybrid OLED panel uses a glass substrate like rigid OLED panels do but also uses the thin-film encapsulation of flexible OLED panels

    OLED panel makers Samsung and LG are also working on a next-generation tech known as Ultra-Thin Glass (UTG), which might also be ready in time for the first OLED iPad

    You can read more here about our expectations for OLED iPads

    ['oled', 'apple', 'use', 'panel', 'glass']

    The first OLED screens were rigid ones, with a glass substrate

    The Elec reports that Apple is likely to use a hybrid form of OLED for iPads, for this reason

    Hybrid OLED panels refer to OLED panels that use both rigid OLED panel and flexible OLED panel technologies [‚Ä¶] A hybrid OLED panel uses a glass substrate like rigid OLED panels do but also uses the thin-film encapsulation of flexible OLED panels

    OLED panel makers Samsung and LG are also working on a next-generation tech known as Ultra-Thin Glass (UTG), which might also be ready in time for the first OLED iPad

  • ETSY SELLERS ARE OFFICIALLY LAUNCHING A UNION TO PROTECT MERCHANTS

    https://mashable.com/article/etsy-indie-sellers-guild-launch

    09/01/2022, 19:14

    66.67% Shortened!

    The guild will officially launch on Sept

    The weeklong strike back in April against "Etsy‚Äôs corporate greed and exploitative policies" led to the formation of the Indie Sellers Guild, which is hoping to continue its work

    "During the Etsy strike, we learned that every single seller and supporter who lent their voice helped make our movement more powerful as a whole as well." The guild currently holds the same demands as that of the strike

    These are the primary policies from Etsy, the guild says, that hurt merchants

    After the initial protest, the company did make changes to the Star Seller program, an initiative by Etsy that elevated the goods of high-volume sellers

    Mashable has reached out to Etsy for comment.

    ['etsy', 'seller', 'strike', 'policy', 'guild']

  • APEX LEGENDS ACCIDENTALLY REVEAL NEW GUN GAME MODE FOR SEASON 14

    https://www.dualshockers.com/apex-legends-gun-game-mode-season-14/

    09/01/2022, 19:04

    60.0% Shortened!

    Shadow Royale will also be returning for a limited time

    By Kyle Knight Respawn Entertainment may have accidentally revealed a new limited-time game mode for Apex Legends, as well as a fan favorite mode set to return

    This likely means a new in-game event will take place during this time and will see the return of Shadow Royale, as well as a brand new limited-time mode known as Gun Game

    Under the format tab, the schedule states that five matches of standard Battle Royale will be played, followed by one match of Gun Game

    A further bullet point then states that Battle Royale matches will consist of three standard Battle Royale match and two Shadow Royale matches, confirming the return of the mode

    Shadow Royale is a limited-time game mode that was first introduced back in Season 6, and often returns during the Halloween season

    ['shadow', 'royale', 'return', 'time', 'game']

  • MYSTERY ASSASSIN'S CREED MIRAGE IMAGE SEEMINGLY LEAKS ONLINE

    https://www.gamesradar.com/mystery-assassins-creed-mirage-image-seemingly-leaks-online/

    09/01/2022, 19:00

    68.42% Shortened!

    The image points to quest-related DLC What appears to be a leaked Assassin's Creed Mirage image has surfaced online

    Earlier today, the Twitter account seen below published the two images depicting a prominent character from Assassin's Creed Mirage

    What we can potentially glean from these images is that the new Assassin's Creed game might feature a quest called "The Forty Thieves." From the depiction of the quest in the new artwork, it seems this is a DLC quest, perhaps even a pre-order bonus for Ubisoft's upcoming game

    The report also stated that the game would launch sometime between April and June 2023, taking the Assassin's Creed series "back to basics," perhaps straying away from the newfound RPG systems used throughout the past three mainline games

    Either way, it could well be the case that both Assassin's Creed Mirage and this new Forty Thieves quest are unveiled by Ubisoft next week

    The company is scheduled to hold a presentation on Saturday, September 10, and it's this event that's been heralded as unveiling the "future of Assassin's Creed." We can hardly think of a more convenient event for Mirage's grand debut.¬† There's also a rumoured stealth-focused Assassin's Creed spin-off game in the works from Ubisoft, which could be separate from Mirage.¬† Hirun Cryer is a freelance reporter and writer with Gamesradar+ based out of U.K

    ['image', 'quest', 'assassin', 'creed', 'mirage']

    HMD‚Äôs Nokia has continued to roll out serviceable but unremarkable smartphones for the last few years

    Now it‚Äôs announced a new subscription plan that it says will ‚Äúreward users‚Äù for keeping their phone for longer

    For now, two devices (and they‚Äôre not even the new Nokia phones) will join Circular; The Nokia XR20 will cost ¬£20 (roughly $23) per month with a ¬£30 (around $35) setup fee

    There is also the Nokia T10 LTE, an entry-level 8-inch tablet, for ¬£10 (roughly $12) a month with the same ¬£30 (around $35) setup fee

    When you return a phone to them, either when you upgrade or leave the service, the company will recycle or refurbish the device

    There will be longevity incentives for holding onto your Nokia phone for longer too, it‚Äôs just not a financial one

    Now it‚Äôs announced a new subscription plan that it says will ‚Äúreward users‚Äù for keeping their phone for longer

    For now, two devices (and they‚Äôre not even the new Nokia phones) will join Circular; The Nokia XR20 will cost ¬£20 (roughly $23) per month with a ¬£30 (around $35) setup fee

    When you return a phone to them, either when you upgrade or leave the service, the company will recycle or refurbish the device

    There will be longevity incentives for holding onto your Nokia phone for longer too, it‚Äôs just not a financial one

  • RING INTERCOM BRINGS SMARTS TO FLATS

    https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/ring-intercom-brings-smarts-to-flats-4262819

    09/01/2022, 16:10

    82.86% Shortened!

    Ring has continued to develop its smart doorbell, culminating with our current favourite, the Ring Video Doorbell Pro 2, but today the company has shifted its attention to apartment blocks with the Ring Intercom

    Rather than replacing the existing intercom, Ring Intercom is designed to work with the existing intercom handset

    Once installed, the existing intercom handset is plugged into the Ring Intercom base station, turning it from a dumb device into a smart one

    Once installed, the current intercom system works as normal, but notifications are also sent to the Ring app, much in the same way as incoming calls from a Ring doorbell

    Here, there‚Äôs no video, but audio is sent encrypted to the Ring app, letting users answer the intercom from anywhere in the world

    Ring Intercom will launch in the UK on September 28, available for ¬£119.99 from Amazon, and shipping on October 26

    ['ring', 'smart', 'doorbell', 'intercom', 'system']

  • MALAYSIAN COURT FINDS FORMER FIRST LADY ROSMAH GUILTY OF BRIBERY

    https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/malaysian-court-deliver-verdict-corruption-trial-former-first-lady-rosmah-2022-08-31/

    09/01/2022, 15:23

    75.0% Shortened!

    Rosmah Mansor, wife of former Malaysian Prime Minister Najib Razak, arrives at the Kuala Lumpur Court Complex to attend a verdict hearing in a corruption case against her, in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia September 1, 2022

    Kuala Lumpur High Court Judge Mohamed Zaini Mazlan said the prosecution proved their case beyond a reasonable doubt

    Before delivering the sentence, the judge asked Rosmah's lawyers to present their case for mitigation

    Rosmah, who faces jail time and a financial penalty, addressed the judge tearfully immediately after the verdict

    Prosecutors say Rosmah sought a bribe of 187.5 million ringgit ($41.80 million), and received 6.5 million ringgit from an official of the company that won the project

    Reuters, the news and media division of Thomson Reuters, is the world‚Äôs largest multimedia news provider, reaching billions of people worldwide every day

    Physically, the Xperia 5 IV is almost the same size as the Xperia 5 III - the IV is even 1mm shorter and narrower, but 4g heavier

    Sony Xperia 5 IV in Black, Ecru White, and Green Despite the unchanged size Sony managed to fit in a 10% larger battery, bringing the Xperia 5 IV to 5,000mAh, on par with the Xperia 1 IV and Xperia 10 IV

    As for charging Sony promises the Xperia 5 IV can go up to 50% on a 30-minute charge with a 30W PD charger

    A bigger battery and wireless charging Sony went conventional with the Xperia 5 IV's camera setup

    ['sony', 'xperia', 'phone', 'big', 'battery']

  • SAMSUNG GALAXY TAB ACTIVE 4 PRO IS SUPER TOUGH, WATERPROOF AND HAS A REMOVABLE BATTERY

    https://www.pocket-lint.com/tablets/news/samsung/162460-samsung-galaxy-tab-active-4-pro

    09/01/2022, 15:10

    50.0% Shortened!

    (Pocket-lint) - Samsung has announced the Galaxy Tab Active 4 Pro tablet, designed to be tough enough to use outside of the office, wherever you might fancy working

    The tablet features MIL-STD-810H military-grade toughness and Samsung claims it is "tough enough to endure even the most demanding work environments"

    Did someone say beach working? - The Galaxy Tab Active 4 Pro offers a 10.2mm frame, weighs 674g and it features Corning Gorilla Glass 5 protection

    There's a replaceable 7600mAh battery on board, as well as fast charging, and there's also a No Battery Mode that allows the tablet to be used continuously at a kiosk or in a vehicle without the battery

    The Samsung Galaxy Tab Active 4 Pro runs on Android 12.0 out of the box and Samsung will offer five years of security updates and three years of OS updates

    The Galaxy Tab Active 4 Pro will be available starting September in parts of Europe, with availability in Asia, Latin America, North America and the Middle East to follow later this year

    ['samsung', 'galaxy', 'tab', 'active', 'pro']

    Since the game‚Äôs limited release, YuGiOh Cross Duel has made over 35,870 USD, according to tracking site AppMagic, with the majority of its earnings being from Hong Kong and Canada

    That number should shoot up once the game gets its global release, with more powerhouse spending regions like SEA, South Korea and Japan getting involved with the game

    YuGiOh Cross Duels is a lane-based 4 player game, wherein players must summon monsters and play spell and trap cards in 4-way duels

    The game has alternate rulesets for its system, such as team battles as well as raid battles featuring big boss monsterss

  • DO STATELESS KIDS BORN IN MALAYSIA NEED TO PLAY FOOTBALL TO GAIN CITIZENSHIP? HANNAH YEOH ASKS GOVT

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/01/do-stateless-kids-born-in-malaysia-need-to-play-football-to-gain-citizenship-hannah-yeoh-asks-govt/25878

    09/01/2022, 13:10

    66.67% Shortened!

    Prominent child rights activist Datuk Hartini Zainuddin also weighed in on Tuck‚Äôs naturalisation as a Malaysian citizen

    Waiting and waiting to get citizenship

    Local media have frequently highlighted the struggles faced by those born domestically and those born overseas to Malaysian mothers in getting Malaysian citizenship

    In June, Malay Mail highlighted the case of Kedah-born Ummal Remiza Khaja Mohideen, who continues to face bureaucracy in gaining Malaysian citizenship for her daughter born in Doha eight years ago

    While Malaysian men have the automatic right to confer citizenship to their children born abroad through the simple process of registration under Article 14(1)(b) of the Federal Constitution, Malaysian women who give birth abroad must apply for Malaysian citizenship under Article 15(2) of the Federal Constitution

    It is then up to the Malaysian government to decide whether to register any person ‚Äï aged below 21 and who has at least one Malaysian parent ‚Äï as a Malaysian citizen under Article 15(2)

    ['malaysian', 'citizenship', 'born', 'child', 'year']

    In June, Malay Mail highlighted the case of Kedah-born Ummal Remiza Khaja Mohideen, who continues to face bureaucracy in gaining Malaysian citizenship for her daughter born in Doha eight years ago

    While Malaysian men have the automatic right to confer citizenship to their children born abroad through the simple process of registration under Article 14(1)(b) of the Federal Constitution, Malaysian women who give birth abroad must apply for Malaysian citizenship under Article 15(2) of the Federal Constitution

    It is then up to the Malaysian government to decide whether to register any person ‚Äï aged below 21 and who has at least one Malaysian parent ‚Äï as a Malaysian citizen under Article 15(2)

    76.0% Shortened!

    The iPhone 14 will mark a big change for the future of conventional smartphones but ones that we have today can pay tribute to the original iPhone launched back in 2007

    The first iPhone was not perfect in any way ‚Äì it lacked a lot of the modern niceties that you assume as a staple on the current-day iPhone 13

    However, the first generation iPhone was a big change from the previously classified smartphones from Nokia, Blackberry and Motorola

    The iPhone 1 allowed one to use their finger to control the device ‚Äì a revolution at the time

    The iPhone also brought the concept of apps on your smartphone

    The successor also introduced 3G connectivity on the iPhone

    ['iphone', 'change', 'smartphones', 'one', 'device']

  • HERE'S MAXIS' RESPONSE AFTER BEING CALLED OUT FOR ITS EXPENSIVE RM15 CALL PASS FOR INTERNATIONAL ROAMING

    https://soyacincau.com/2022/09/01/maxis-responds-rm15-unlimited-call-sms-voice-international-roaming-plan-pay-per-use/

    09/01/2022, 13:00

    57.14% Shortened!

    As highlighted by our reader recently, Maxis postpaid customers are charged RM15 for making or answering a single voice call while travelling overseas

    This exorbitant charge is due to Maxis‚Äô 1 Day Calls and SMS Unlimited Pass, which is activated automatically when you make or receive a call, or after sending more than 3 SMS in a day

    This mandatory auto-activation of RM15 per day is only applicable to customers of the current Maxis Postpaid plans while customers on older postpaid as well as Hotlink prepaid and postpaid, are still charged based on pay-per-use, which is more appropriate

    Our intention for the unlimited Call & SMS daily pass was for everyone to enjoy worry free unlimited calls and SMS capped at RM15, not just incoming calls

    Ideally, Maxis should charge users based on their current pay-per-use rate until the total usage reaches a specific threshold

    Since postpaid customers are already paying a premium, it would be nice if all telcos provide a decent amount of roaming data and voice minutes for a hassle-free and bill-shock-free experience.

    ['maxi', 'postpaid', 'customer', 'charge', 'call']

    As highlighted by our reader recently, Maxis postpaid customers are charged RM15 for making or answering a single voice call while travelling overseas

    This mandatory auto-activation of RM15 per day is only applicable to customers of the current Maxis Postpaid plans while customers on older postpaid as well as Hotlink prepaid and postpaid, are still charged based on pay-per-use, which is more appropriate

    Our intention for the unlimited Call & SMS daily pass was for everyone to enjoy worry free unlimited calls and SMS capped at RM15, not just incoming calls

    Ideally, Maxis should charge users based on their current pay-per-use rate until the total usage reaches a specific threshold

    He had earlier asked the police to launch an investigation into the scandal but was met with a counter-complaint filed by an aide of Dr Abdul Latiff, who is also the Mersing MP, yesterday for alleged defamation

    Rafizi then expressed his concern that this could mean the police might not record Dr Abdul Latiff‚Äôs statement or even investigate him in relation to his earlier police report

    He said that if that were to happen, it might give the public the perception that this was because the police are under the Home Ministry whose minister Datuk Seri Hamzah Zainudin is in the same party Dr Abdul Latiff

    Lenovo on Thursday introduced a pair of midrange Android tablets that it hopes will steal market share from Apple's popular iPad

    The tablet runs Android 12, and Lenovo promises updates through Android 14

    Lenovo doesn't say how much battery life to expect from the 7,700mAh cell

    This slate ships with Android 12L, the tablet-specific version of Android 12, and should eventually get an upgrade to Android 14

    In November 2021, the iPad held about 59% of the market to Android's 41%

    Maybe in this new form factor, Lenovo can finally make the groundbreaking device that they wanted the first X1 Fold to be

    ['big', 'lenovo', 'fold', 'foldable', 'device']

    Much of this new X1 Fold will be familiar to fans not just of the previous X1 Fold, but of the ThinkPad line in general

    The 2020 X1 Fold‚Äôs keyboard was well-made but had to fit horizontally across a 13.3-inch device, which meant it was really dang cramped

    That, interestingly, is the same price the 13-inch model had (and this is a bigger, thinner, and generally more usable device)

    I don‚Äôt expect this device to be perfect

    I think they understand exactly what the limitations of the 13-inch Fold were and were happy to have a larger foldable screen come along

    Maybe in this new form factor, Lenovo can finally make the groundbreaking device that they wanted the first X1 Fold to be

    ['big', 'lenovo', 'fold', 'foldable', 'device']

    Azalina's way, at the minimum, feels like starting off on the wrong foot

    Hence, the apprehension about Umno appointing "an AG of our own." Azalina, the way your Umno cohorts were blaming Prime Minister Ismail Sabri Yaacob for being a ‚Äúcruel leader‚Äù is testament to the fact that they expected the PM to intervene in the judiciary process to free Najib and drop charges against Zahid

    Hence, her speech last Saturday left me aghast

    Her attempts to school Fann and defend her call to appoint an Umno-friendly AG are quite masterful

    In fact, I would say she is deliberately evasive and circumlocutory

    But it‚Äôs just not good enough, Azalina

    It runs Android 12 with Samsung's One UI on top.

    More Samsung Galaxy Tab Active4 Pro official images The Galaxy Tab Active4 Pro and its S Pen are IP68 rated as protected from dust, dirt, and sand, and can withstand being submerged in up to 1.5m of fresh water for up to 30 minutes

    The Galaxy Tab Active4 Pro will be available "in parts of Europe" in September, Samsung says, with Asia, Latin America, North America, and the Middle East to follow "later in 2022"

    I'm pretty sure this tablet has DeX support since the Tab Active3 has it

  • MICROSOFT FINDS TIKTOK VULNERABILITY THAT ALLOWED ONE-CLICK ACCOUNT COMPROMISES

    https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2022/08/microsoft-finds-tiktok-vulnerability-that-allowed-one-click-account-compromises/

    09/01/2022, 09:10

    68.42% Shortened!

    Microsoft said on Wednesday that it recently identified a vulnerability in TikTok's Android app that could allow attackers to hijack accounts when users did nothing more than click on a single errant link

    Deeplinks must be declared in an app's manifest for use outside of the app so, for example, someone who clicks on a TikTok link in a browser has the content automatically opened in the TikTok app

    An app can also cryptographically declare the validity of a URL domain

    TikTok on Android, for instance, declares the domain m.tiktok.com

    Normally, the TikTok app will allow content from tiktok.com to be loaded into its WebView component but forbid WebView from loading content from other domains

    Read our affiliate link policy.

    ['vulnerability', 'tiktok', 'app', 'attacker', 'user']

    The news was shared during the company‚Äôs European launch event of the Oppo Reno 8 Pro, the Reno 8, and the Reno 8 Lite

    As Oppo aligns itself with other companies by removing charging adapters from its products over the coming year, Zhang didn‚Äôt explain why the company was shifting its strategy

  • TENCENT, SONY THROW BIG MONEY AT ELDEN RING MAKER FROMSOFTWARE

    https://kotaku.com/elden-ring-fromsoftware-acquisition-sony-tencent-dark-s-1849481673

    09/01/2022, 08:09

    66.67% Shortened!

    Elden Ring wasn‚Äôt just a hit with fans of FromSoftware‚Äôs notoriously difficult action-RPGs

    Today‚Äôs announcement from FromSoft‚Äôs parent company Kadokawa revealed that Sony and Tencent are acquiring 14.09% and 16.25% of FromSoft, respectively

    The statement indicates that Kadokawa wants FromSoftware to be able to expand its development efforts; Kadokawa sees the ‚Äúenhancement of capabilities for the creation, development and deployment of [FromSoft] game IP as one of the [Kadokawa] Group‚Äôs highest priorities.‚Äù One of the aims is to give FromSoft the resources needed to grow Elden Ring into a franchise that extends beyond just video games

    Elden Ring was a long time coming, built on a foundation first laid down in FromSoftware‚Äôs pioneering 2009 PS3 game Demon‚Äôs Souls

    It owns 5% of Assassin‚Äôs Creed and Far Cry publisher Ubisoft, completed an acquisition of League of Legends‚Äô developer Riot Games, owns 40% of Epic Games, and has stakes in many, many, many, many other game companies

    Sony has also been on a spending spree too, though it looks a bit more modest compared to Tencent

    ['elden', 'ring', 'fromsoftware', 'tencent', 'sony']

    The statement indicates that Kadokawa wants FromSoftware to be able to expand its development efforts; Kadokawa sees the ‚Äúenhancement of capabilities for the creation, development and deployment of [FromSoft] game IP as one of the [Kadokawa] Group‚Äôs highest priorities.‚Äù One of the aims is to give FromSoft the resources needed to grow Elden Ring into a franchise that extends beyond just video games

    Elden Ring was a long time coming, built on a foundation first laid down in FromSoftware‚Äôs pioneering 2009 PS3 game Demon‚Äôs Souls

    It owns 5% of Assassin‚Äôs Creed and Far Cry publisher Ubisoft, completed an acquisition of League of Legends‚Äô developer Riot Games, owns 40% of Epic Games, and has stakes in many, many, many, many other game companies

    Every subsequent update for iOS and iPadOS 15 has understandably reinforced our assumption that Apple had dropped iOS 12 support for evermore, and so we relegated the old iPhone to background duty, solely as an emergency device for maps or phone calls while on the road

    (We figured that another crash would be unlikely to wreck the screen any further, so it seemed a useful compromise.) But we‚Äôve just noticed that Apple has decided to update iOS 12 again after all

    (Before iOS 13.1 and iPadOS 13.1 came out, iPhones and iPads used the same operating system, referred to as iOS for both devices.) We didn‚Äôt receive a Security Advisory email from Apple, but an alert Naked Security reader who knows we still have that old iPhone 6+ let us know about Apple Security Bulletin HT213428

    Remember that WebKit bugs exist, loosely speaking, at the software layer below Safari, so that Apple‚Äôs own Safari browser isn‚Äôt the only app at risk from this vulnerability

    It was simply down to the fact that an update wasn‚Äôt available yet

    As an avid biker and Apple device user and geek who observes life‚Äôs unassuming details, I expect you like that.

    XDA‚Äôs official marketplace for buying and selling tech Premium videos Typically, we would have received a new build of Windows 11 in the Dev channel at this point in the week, but instead, Microsoft is rolling out an update to the Windows Subsystem for Android today

    While the changes in today‚Äôs update aren‚Äôt huge, they are welcome

    There‚Äôs a new compatibility shim, which allows apps to be resized while still maintaining their aspect ratio, instead of trying to stretch them to fit the aspect ratio of the window that contains them

    Still on the topic of compatibility, Microsoft has added some new educative dialog for game controls in games that have compatibility shims enabled

    Every other update is fairly minor, though there‚Äôs also a new security update for Android, and the Amazon Appstore itself has been updated to version 60.09

    However, if you‚Äôve worked around that regional restriction, you should still get the update just fine

  • TENCENT AND SONY INTERACTIVE ENTERTAINMENT COLLECTIVELY ACQUIRE 30.34 PERCENT OF FROMSOFTWARE

    https://www.gematsu.com/2022/08/tencent-and-sony-interactive-entertainment-collectively-acquire-30-34-percent-of-fromsoftware

    08/31/2022, 23:08

    79.31% Shortened!

    FromSoftware has issued new shares of its stock to Tencent Holdings subsidiary Sixjoy Hong Kong and Sony Group subsidiary Sony Interactive Entertainment, FromSoftware parent company Kadokawa Corporation announced

    Through the third-party allotment, Sixjoy Hong Kong will own 16.25 percent of FromSoftware‚Äôs shares, and Sony Interactive Entertainment will own 14.09 percent

    In line with this policy, the Company has decided to have FromSoftware implement fund procurement by way of a Third-Party Allotment to Sixjoy and SIE, the scheduled allottees, for the reasons outlined below

    In February 2021, the Company conducted a third-party allotment with Sony as the allottee with the aim of strengthening its relationship with the Sony Group over the long term, and creating new IP of the Company and maximizing the utilization of its existing IP in anime and game fields

    Sony, the parent company of SIE, is listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange

    Schedule for the Third-Party Allotment (Note) Payment for this third-party allotment is scheduled to be made on September 7, 2022

    ['fromsoftware', 'sony', 'group', 'company', 'third']

    FromSoftware has issued new shares of its stock to Tencent Holdings subsidiary Sixjoy Hong Kong and Sony Group subsidiary Sony Interactive Entertainment, FromSoftware parent company Kadokawa Corporation announced

    Through the third-party allotment, Sixjoy Hong Kong will own 16.25 percent of FromSoftware‚Äôs shares, and Sony Interactive Entertainment will own 14.09 percent

    In line with this policy, the Company has decided to have FromSoftware implement fund procurement by way of a Third-Party Allotment to Sixjoy and SIE, the scheduled allottees, for the reasons outlined below

    In February 2021, the Company conducted a third-party allotment with Sony as the allottee with the aim of strengthening its relationship with the Sony Group over the long term, and creating new IP of the Company and maximizing the utilization of its existing IP in anime and game fields

    Sony, the parent company of SIE, is listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange

    Schedule for the Third-Party Allotment (Note) Payment for this third-party allotment is scheduled to be made on September 7, 2022

  • DIGITAL NASIONAL BERHAD CONFIRMS LAST MINUTE CHANGES TO TELCO SHAREHOLDER AGREEMENTS

    https://www.lowyat.net/2022/283320/dnb-5g-maxis-umobile-shareholder/

    08/31/2022, 21:12

    60.0% Shortened!

    The national 5G company, Digital Nasional Berhad (DNB) has confirmed that there were indeed some last-minute changes to its shareholder agreement that was supposed to involve six local telcos

    The report further added that Maxis and U Mobile did not see any benefits in having stakes in the national 5G company although both telcos apparently still want to obtain 5G access from DNB

    DNB generally confirmed this through its media statement [pdf] which said that one of the six telcos decided not to proceed with the shareholder agreement while another choose not to respond even though they have earlier confirmed their participation in the agreement

    At the moment, DNB is not able to confirm when this process will be concluded but the company is confident that all four telcos will continue to be on board

    Meanwhile, DNB also said that discussions on the 5G Access Agreements are still going on with all six telcos

    The company also clarified that telcos don‚Äôt have to take up any equity in DNB for them to sign up for 5G access

    ['company', 'dnb', 'confirm', 'agreement', 'six']

    The national 5G company, Digital Nasional Berhad (DNB) has confirmed that there were indeed some last-minute changes to its shareholder agreement that was supposed to involve six local telcos

    The report further added that Maxis and U Mobile did not see any benefits in having stakes in the national 5G company although both telcos apparently still want to obtain 5G access from DNB

    DNB generally confirmed this through its media statement [pdf] which said that one of the six telcos decided not to proceed with the shareholder agreement while another choose not to respond even though they have earlier confirmed their participation in the agreement

    At the moment, DNB is not able to confirm when this process will be concluded but the company is confident that all four telcos will continue to be on board

    Meanwhile, DNB also said that discussions on the 5G Access Agreements are still going on with all six telcos

    The company also clarified that telcos don‚Äôt have to take up any equity in DNB for them to sign up for 5G access

    ['company', 'dnb', 'confirm', 'agreement', 'six']

  • NVIDIA BROADCAST SUPPORT WILL MAKE VIRTUAL GREEN SCREENS EASIER IN OBS STUDIO

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/31/23330379/nvidia-broadcast-virtual-green-screen-obs-studio-support

    08/31/2022, 21:10

    62.5% Shortened!

    The feature is far from perfect and won‚Äôt replace the quality of a physical green screen, but we can attest that it does a decent job

    Previously, it was possible to use a virtual green screen in OBS via plugins, but Nvidia Broadcast will make the feature much more accessible

    Those who use an Nvidia RTX graphics card could probably already have the software installed, and Nvidia Broadcast also integrates with lots of popular streaming hardware and applications

    For example, Corsair integrated Nvidia Broadcast tools into its iCue and Elgato software back in July 2022, allowing those who rely on Corsair or Elgato hardware to utilize certain features such as its impressive background noise suppression

    The Elgato Camera Hub also got access to Virtual Backgrounds at this time, allowing streamers to access Nvidia Broadcast tools without going to the app directly

    Virtual Backgrounds is the only Nvidia -specific feature added to the latest version of OBS (version 28.0) but there are other non-Nvidia Broadcast features coming to the service, such as support for high-efficiency video coding (HEVC or H.265) and high-dynamic range (HDR)

    ['ob', 'feature', 'virtual', 'background', 'nvidia']

    08/31/2022, 21:08

    80.0% Shortened!

    The government had wanted six of the country's mobile operators to agree on taking a combined 70% stake in the agency, Digital Nasional Berhad (DNB)

    Maxis and U Mobile could not see benefits in being a minority shareholder in DNB, said two of the sources, but added that the firms have told the government they want to remain in talks for access to DNB's 5G network

    Celcom, Digi and U Mobile declined to comment

    DNB did not respond to a Reuters request for comment but it confirmed to local media that two carriers had decided not to proceed with the stake purchases

    DNB did not identify any of the companies involved

    Reuters, the news and media division of Thomson Reuters, is the world‚Äôs largest multimedia news provider, reaching billions of people worldwide every day

  • INFRARED LASER THAT CAN POWER DEVICES 100 FT AWAY COULD CHARGE YOUR PHONE WHEN YOU ENTER A ROOM

    https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sciencetech/article-11164201/Infrared-laser-power-devices-100-ft-away-charge-phone-enter-room.html

    08/31/2022, 20:17

    82.86% Shortened!

    This means that it is comprised of a transmitter and receiver

    The cell can convert the light energy into electricity to power the device, and the¬†receiver's ball shape lens also allows for it to pick up incoming beams from any direction

    This means that the transmitter does not need to track or lock in on the receiver

    If something obstructs the line-of-sight between the¬†transmitter and receiver, it automatically switches to 'safe power transfer mode' and lowers the intensity of the beam

    Do you want to automatically post your MailOnline comments to your Facebook Timeline? Your comment will be posted to MailOnline as usual

    Do you want to automatically post your MailOnline comments to your Facebook Timeline? Your comment will be posted to MailOnline as usual We will automatically post your comment and a link to the news story to your Facebook timeline at the same time it is posted on MailOnline

    ['charge', 'device', 'beam', 'power', 'transmitter']

    This means that it is comprised of a transmitter and receiver

    The cell can convert the light energy into electricity to power the device, and the¬†receiver's ball shape lens also allows for it to pick up incoming beams from any direction

    This means that the transmitter does not need to track or lock in on the receiver

    If something obstructs the line-of-sight between the¬†transmitter and receiver, it automatically switches to 'safe power transfer mode' and lowers the intensity of the beam

    Do you want to automatically post your MailOnline comments to your Facebook Timeline? Your comment will be posted to MailOnline as usual

    The regular 6D - like the ROG Phone 6 - has an illuminated logo on the back, whereas the 6D Ultimate - like ROG Phone 6 Pro - sports a (possibly OLED) display.

    Asus ROG Phone 6D ‚Ä¢ Asus ROG Phone 6D Ultimate If the differences between the ROG Phone 6 and ROG Phone 6 Pro are anything to go by, then specs-wise, the ROG Phone 6D and ROG Phone 6D Ultimate will also be identical phones with different memory options

    08/31/2022, 19:09

    50.0% Shortened!

    You have come to the ESPN Africa edition, for other ESPN editions, click above

    Barcelona striker Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang suffered a broken jaw during a robbery at his house earlier in the week, sources confirmed to ESPN

    Aubameyang was assaulted in the early hours of Monday morning when a gang broke into his home equipped with firearms and iron bars

    But sources have now confirmed to ESPN that the former Arsenal striker did break his jaw during the break-in and will be out for around three weeks, which could have implications on a proposed move to Chelsea

    The injury to Aubameyang's jaw has slightly changed the negotiations, however, with a loan to the west London club emerging as a possible solution

    Barca coach Xavi Hernandez is happy to keep Aubameyang, but the club's need to reduce their wage bill to fund other business before the transfer window closes this week has forced them to listen to offers

    ['espn', 'aubameyang', 'jaw', 'week', 'source']

    You can also call the Oppo A57e a version of A57 4G with Bluetooth 5.2 and a single memory option - 4GB RAM and 64GB storage.

    57.14% Shortened!

    By Mohamed Hassan Yasuyuki Oda, the producer of many recent SNK fighting hits such as King of Fighters XV and Samurai Shodown has expressed his gratitude for the fans‚Äô interest in the idea of a new SNK vs Capcom revival entry, and says that there is an interest from all involved parties in making this a reality

    The flame that started this was the collaborative promotional posters exhibited at the last 2022 Evo fighting game tournament

    The posters featured artworks from both SNK and Capcom games, which fueled the excitement of fans, and gave a clear message to the developers that SNK vs Capcom shouldn‚Äôt only be viewed from the angle of nostalgia

    The Evo tournament had fans from all over the world, and all these fighting game community members were excited at the prospect of this beloved series returning again

    Director Hideki Itsuno (The director of SNK Vs Capcom 2) told Polygon he would love to work on a third game in the series, but currently he is working on Dragon‚Äôs Dogma 2, so that potential might be on the shelf for now

    The creators and the publishers are definitely listening, and so its good for fans to start becoming more vocal about what they want in the SNK Vs Capcom or fighting games in particular, because its a special genre where each game changes the general picture of the community and the fighting game scene as a whole

    ['fan', 'oda', 'snk', 'fight', 'capcom']

    08/31/2022, 17:08

    53.85% Shortened!

    Variable aperture as the name implies is the size of the aperture that can be adjusted to support at least two stops of aperture change, to better match the use of scenarios, such as dark scenes opening a large aperture, and then reducing the aperture in bright light

    Later, the large bottom sensor began to popularize, and variable aperture is gradually abandoned

    According to several reports, the Huawei Mate 50 Pro camera will use the new variable aperture technology, and the lens aperture can be adjusted between F1.4 ~ and F4

    Variable aperture as the name implies is the size of the aperture that can be adjusted to support at least two stops of aperture change, to better match the use of scenarios, such as dark scenes opening a large aperture, and then reducing the aperture in bright light

    Later, the large bottom sensor began to popularize, and variable aperture is gradually abandoned

    According to several reports, the Huawei Mate 50 Pro camera will use the new variable aperture technology, and the lens aperture can be adjusted between F1.4 ~ and F4

  • SONY AND TENCENT ACQUIRE AN INCREASED SHARE IN ELDEN RING DEVELOPER FROMSOFTWARE

    https://www.gamesradar.com/sony-and-tencent-acquire-an-increased-share-in-elden-ring-developer-fromsoftware/

    08/31/2022, 17:00

    73.91% Shortened!

    GamesRadar+ is supported by its audience

    The two tech giants now own a combined 30% of the studio Sony and Chinese publishing giant Tencent are both set to increase their stake in Elden Ring and Dark Souls developer FromSoftware

    In an announcement this morning, FromSoft parent company Kadokawa Corporation - which remains the majority owner of the developer - confirmed that Sony now owns 14.09% of FromSoftware

    Beyond that, attention is likely to turn to Elden Ring - as well as hopes for upcoming Elden Ring DLC, FromSoftware and publisher Bando Namcai have discussed their desire for the title to act as the start of a new franchise

    While the future of Elden Ring seems in a better space than its more gothic older brother, it's far from clear at this point what we can expect from the deal, and Kadokawa Corporation suggests that the deal's impact on its 2023 financial results is likely to be "minor." This list of new games 2022 should prove a more reliable wishlist

    I'm GamesRadar's news editor, working with the team to deliver breaking news from across the industry

  • HOW TO FIND WI-FI PASSWORDS OF NETWORKS YOU HAVE CONNECTED TO ON YOUR ANDROID DEVICES

    https://www.firstpost.com/tech/how-to/how-to-find-wi-fi-passwords-of-networks-you-have-connected-to-on-your-android-devices-11143601.html

    08/31/2022, 16:19

    53.85% Shortened!

    On many occasions, you might not have noted down the Wi-Fi password or saved it

    But did you know that your phone saves all the Wi-Fi passwords for easy access

    So, if you want to connect your laptop or desktop to a Wi-Fi network saved in your Android phone, all you need to do is view the password on your phone and type in your system

    For people using Android 6 to 9, the Wi-Fi password is only visible as plain text if your device is rooted

    However, if you have received a QR code for the Wi-Fi network, you can scan it using Google Lens to view the password

    Did you find these steps useful? Let us know in the comments

    ['android', 'phone', 'network', 'password', 'step']

    On many occasions, you might not have noted down the Wi-Fi password or saved it

    But did you know that your phone saves all the Wi-Fi passwords for easy access

    So, if you want to connect your laptop or desktop to a Wi-Fi network saved in your Android phone, all you need to do is view the password on your phone and type in your system

    For people using Android 6 to 9, the Wi-Fi password is only visible as plain text if your device is rooted

    However, if you have received a QR code for the Wi-Fi network, you can scan it using Google Lens to view the password

    Did you find these steps useful? Let us know in the comments

    ['android', 'phone', 'network', 'password', 'step']

  • JAPAN TO ALLOW NON-GUIDED GROUP TOURS FROM SEPTEMBER

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2022/08/31/japan-to-allow-non-guided-group-tours-from-september

    08/31/2022, 16:08

    76.92% Shortened!

    Japan had 353,119 foreign visitors last year, a far cry from the record 31.9 million in 2019

    Kishida said the daily entry cap would be raised to 50,000 people from the current 20,000

    Japan had about 246,000 foreign visitors last year, a far cry from the record 31.9 million in 2019

    The small trickle of foreigners allowed into the country last year spent 120 billion yen (US$866 million)

    In 2019, they spent 4.8 trillion yen, or forty times more, according to the Japan Tourism Agency

    Last week, Kishida said that from Sept 7 Japan would scrap a requirement to show a negative Covid-19 result to enter the country for travellers who have received three vaccine doses

    ['japan', 'last', 'year', 'allow', 'tour']

  • MALAYSIA'S 5G PLANS HIT AS TWO CARRIERS DECLINE STAKES IN STATE AGENCY -SOURCES

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2022/08/31/malaysia039s-5g-plans-hit-as-two-carriers-decline-stakes-in-state-agency--sources

    08/31/2022, 16:08

    70.0% Shortened!

    The government had wanted six of the country's mobile operators to agree on taking a combined 70% stake in the agency, Digital Nasional Berhad (DNB)

    A counter-proposal by Maxis, U Mobile and two other major carriers, Celcom Axiata Bhd and DiGi Telecommunications, for the four of them to take a combined majority stake was knocked back by the government

    Maxis and U Mobile could not see benefits in being a minority shareholder in DNB, said two of the sources, but added that the firms have told the government they want to remain in talks for access to DNB's 5G network

    Maxis, DNB and Malaysia's finance and communication ministries did not immediately respond to requests for comment

    Celcom, Digi and U Mobile declined to comment

    The government rejected that proposal but said it would offer the carriers stakes in DNB to alleviate their concerns

    ['two', 'mobile', 'carrier', 'plan', 'maxi']

    The government had wanted six of the country's mobile operators to agree on taking a combined 70% stake in the agency, Digital Nasional Berhad (DNB)

    Maxis and U Mobile could not see benefits in being a minority shareholder in DNB, said two of the sources, but added that the firms have told the government they want to remain in talks for access to DNB's 5G network

    Maxis, DNB and Malaysia's finance and communication ministries did not immediately respond to requests for comment

  • HOW TO FIND WI-FI PASSWORDS OF NETWORKS YOU HAVE CONNECTED TO ON YOUR ANDROID DEVICES- TECHNOLOGY NEWS

    https://www.firstpost.com/tech/how-to/how-to-find-wi-fi-passwords-of-networks-you-have-connected-to-on-your-android-devices-11143601.html

    08/31/2022, 15:08

    53.85% Shortened!

    On many occasions, you might not have noted down the Wi-Fi password or saved it

    But did you know that your phone saves all the Wi-Fi passwords for easy access

    So, if you want to connect your laptop or desktop to a Wi-Fi network saved in your Android phone, all you need to do is view the password on your phone and type in your system

    For people using Android 6 to 9, the Wi-Fi password is only visible as plain text if your device is rooted

    However, if you have received a QR code for the Wi-Fi network, you can scan it using Google Lens to view the password

    Did you find these steps useful? Let us know in the comments

    ['android', 'phone', 'network', 'password', 'step']

    On many occasions, you might not have noted down the Wi-Fi password or saved it

    But did you know that your phone saves all the Wi-Fi passwords for easy access

    So, if you want to connect your laptop or desktop to a Wi-Fi network saved in your Android phone, all you need to do is view the password on your phone and type in your system

    For people using Android 6 to 9, the Wi-Fi password is only visible as plain text if your device is rooted

    However, if you have received a QR code for the Wi-Fi network, you can scan it using Google Lens to view the password

    Did you find these steps useful? Let us know in the comments

    ['android', 'phone', 'network', 'password', 'step']

    Since the Ryzen 7000 CPUs use a new AM5 socket, you‚Äôll need to buy an entirely new motherboard

    Below, we'll detail everything AMD has detailed about the AM5 platform

    This means you won‚Äôt be able to use DDR4 RAM with your new motherboard

    AMD says it will support AM5 at least until 2025

    85.0% Shortened!

    From lossless audio support to fitness tracking, these are the big upgrades we hope to see on the AirPods Pro 2 Apple's AirPods Pro 2 could well be one of the stars of the Apple September Event that's now confirmed for September 7

    While some people will be most excited about possible changes to the AirPods Pro 2's design, that's not how I roll.¬† As I'm a quality-audio enthusiast, the most exciting feature I'd like to see on the AirPods Pro 2's spec sheet is support for Apple's own ALAC (Apple Lossless Audio Codec) format

    However, a patent, spotted by¬†Patently Apple (opens in new tab), could enable the AirPods to overcome that problem by instead using optical audio transmission tech.¬† Regardless of what happens there, the AirPods Pro 2 have been tipped to come with Bluetooth LE Audio support

    Any ANC improvement on the new model would be welcome

    This was first hinted at in a 2020 Apple patent, and the AirPods Pro 2 could potentially be the first to harness a new chip with more sophisticated smart processing to enable this functionality

    The current AirPods Pro manage around 4.5 hours of playback time, but the AirPods 3 can get to 6 hours playback from a single charge ‚Äî albeit without ANC

    The Liverpool number three has set up a total of 57 chances in his Premier League career

    One of the three clear-cut chances Fabinho set up in his debut campaign was for Salah

    Fabinho assisted Salah at Brentford in almost identical fashion to how they linked up against Bournemouth, with a through ball played over the top

    ['fabinho', 'salah', 'liverpool', 'ball', 'would']

    ‚ÄúIf we'd have won 1-0 I would have been over the moon

  • AMD RYZEN 9 7950X3D, RYZEN 9 7900X3D & RYZEN 7 7800X3D ZEN 4 V-CACHE CPUS RUMORED TO DEBUT AT CES 2023

    https://wccftech.com/amd-ryzen-9-7950x3d-ryzen-9-7900x3d-ryzen-7-7800x3d-zen-4-v-cache-cpus-ces-2023-debut-rumor/

    08/31/2022, 13:08

    73.91% Shortened!

    AMD is rumored to launch three new Zen 4 V-Cache CPUs, the Ryzen 9 7950X3D, Ryzen 9 7900X3D & Ryzen 7 7800X3D at CES 2023

    The latest rumor regarding the Zen 4 V-Cache parts comes from Greymon55 who has put forward a cryptic tweet referring to the Ryzen 7000 3D V-Cache CPUs

    According to the tweet, three Ryzen 3D V-Cache CPUs have been rumored, the Ryzen 9 7950X3D, Ryzen 9 7900X3D & the Ryzen 7 7800X3D

    We can't say for sure yet if AMD will have a single CCD stacked with a 3D cache stack or if both Zen 4 CCDs will be stacked

    In any case, if AMD goes with the existing 64 MB SRAM (3D V-Cache) stack, we will get up to 104 MB cache on the Ryzen 7 7800X3D, up to 140 MB cache on the Ryzen 9 7900X3D, and a whopping 144 MB of cache on the Ryzen 9 7950X3D

    That's a 2.6x increase over Ryzen 7 7700X, an 85% increase over the 7900X, and an 80% increase over the Ryzen 9 7950X

    ['amd', 'zen', 'cache', 'ryzen', 'part']

    AMD is rumored to launch three new Zen 4 V-Cache CPUs, the Ryzen 9 7950X3D, Ryzen 9 7900X3D & Ryzen 7 7800X3D at CES 2023

    The latest rumor regarding the Zen 4 V-Cache parts comes from Greymon55 who has put forward a cryptic tweet referring to the Ryzen 7000 3D V-Cache CPUs

    According to the tweet, three Ryzen 3D V-Cache CPUs have been rumored, the Ryzen 9 7950X3D, Ryzen 9 7900X3D & the Ryzen 7 7800X3D

    We can't say for sure yet if AMD will have a single CCD stacked with a 3D cache stack or if both Zen 4 CCDs will be stacked

    In any case, if AMD goes with the existing 64 MB SRAM (3D V-Cache) stack, we will get up to 104 MB cache on the Ryzen 7 7800X3D, up to 140 MB cache on the Ryzen 9 7900X3D, and a whopping 144 MB of cache on the Ryzen 9 7950X3D

    That's a 2.6x increase over Ryzen 7 7700X, an 85% increase over the 7900X, and an 80% increase over the Ryzen 9 7950X

    ['amd', 'zen', 'cache', 'ryzen', 'part']



  • HOW TO QUICKLY START A VOICE RECORDING ON YOUR IPHONE

    https://www.pocket-lint.com/apps/news/apple/162434-how-record-voice-notes-on-your-iphone

    08/31/2022, 13:06

    68.42% Shortened!

    (Pocket-lint) - Let's say you're in a situation where you want to be able to quickly record a voice note on your iPhone

    - You won't have to do this every time, but in order to record a voice note on your phone, you'll need an app that offers an audio recording feature

    While Apple‚Äôs App Store is filled with third-party voice note apps, Apple‚Äôs built-in Voice Memos app is very user-friendly

    Again, you won't have to do this every time, but if you add the Voice Memos app to your Control Centre, you'll be able to quickly access it there every day going forward

    And that's it! You recorded a voice note in no time at all

    Check out Apple's support hub for Voice Memos to learn more about the app.

    ['quickly', 'record', 'voice', 'note', 'time']

  • 8BITDO LAUNCHES THE WIRELESS ULTIMATE GAMING CONTROLLER

    https://hypebeast.com/2022/8/8bitdo-wireless-ultimate-gaming-controller-release

    08/31/2022, 13:02

    45.45% Shortened!

    If you‚Äôre looking for a new controller to update your gaming setup, 8BitDo has now updated its sleek Ultimate Controller design with the introduction of new wireless models as well

    Now available in either Bluetooth or 2.4GHz wireless configurations or a traditional wired model

    The new lineup carries an Xbox-styled layout with a left analog stick and the A-B-X-Y buttons on either side while a right analog stick and left-handed D-pad sit lower in the center

    As for compatibility, the Bluetooth version will link up with Windows PCs and the Nintendo Switch while the 2.4GHz variant works with Windows, Android and Raspberry Pi platforms

    The wired version will then connect with Windows, Android, Raspberry Pi and the Switch

    Available in black, white and pink, prices for 8BitDo‚Äôs new Ultimate Controller range from $35 USD to $70 USD and deliveries are expected for October.

    ['new', 'controller', 'update', 'game', '8bitdo']

    In March 2020, Dr Mahathir came into close contact with Bandar Kuching MP Dr Kelvin Yii who tested positive for Covid-19

    While Dr Mahathir tested negative, he observed a 14-day self-quarantine as was required then

    In late July 2021, one of Dr Mahathir's officers was asymptomatic and had tested positive for Covid-19 in a screening at Parliament

    Dr Mahathir tested negative again after the second scare, even though he said he did not have contact with the officer in Parliament

    The last time the Langkawi MP was admitted to the National Heart Institute (IJN) was in late January this year

    On January 22, Dr Mahathir was confirmed to be in IJN and having undergone a medical treatment

  • NEW PIXEL 7 SERIES TO SUPPORT BLUETOOTH LE AUDIO (LC3 CODEC) - GSMARENA.COM NEWS

    https://www.gsmarena.com/new_pixel_7_series_to_support_bluetooth_le_audio_lc3_codec-news-55590.php

    08/31/2022, 12:10

    64.71% Shortened!

    New findings by 9to5Google suggest that the new Google Pixel 7 series (and future Pixel 7a) may support a new Bluetooth codec

    Android 13 brought support for ‚ÄòBluetooth LE Audio‚Äô using the LC3 codec

    This exchange infers that the new Bluetooth LE Audio feature will be supported by the new Pixel phones

    The LC3 audio codec will be able to compress audio more efficiently and it can be configured to use more or less bandwidth such as when there‚Äôs suddenly a longer distance between the host device and connected audio

    Of course, for any regular consumer to be able to take advantage of this new codec, both the Android smartphone and audio device must support the same codec

    The Google Pixel 7 and 7 Pro (along with the Pixel Watch) will be released sometime in October

    ['google', 'new', 'pixel', 'support', 'codec']

  • TNB AND MYSURI BIZ EV TAXI COLLABORATION - FIRST CABS IN TEKSIKU SERVICE DUE OUT IN NOV, 1,000 UNITS PLANNED - PAULTAN.ORG

    https://paultan.org/2022/08/31/tnb-and-mysuri-biz-ev-taxi-collaboration-first-cabs-in-teksiku-service-due-out-in-nov-1000-units-planned/

    08/31/2022, 12:08

    57.14% Shortened!

    The service, which will eventually be introduced to other states, will be offered by the company under the TeksiKu banner

    Mohd Noor said that the EV taxis are aimed at transforming the public transport service, and the programme would enable taxi drivers to adopt new technologies without the need to fork out a large investment

    Mohd Noor said a deal for that is still being discussed

    In general, charging infrastructure support in the public domain will be provided by TNB, but Mysuri will also implement a network of chargers for taxi drivers to recharge their vehicles

    Bookings for the service, when it eventually kicks off, can be made via the TeksiKu app, but the company will also set up electronic kiosks in strategic locations (for example, in airports and stations within the rail network) to enable those without the app to easily secure a ride

    Mohd Noor said a deal for that is still being discussed

    In general, charging infrastructure support in the public domain will be provided by TNB, but Mysuri will also implement a network of chargers for taxi drivers to recharge their vehicles

    Bookings for the service, when it eventually kicks off, can be made via the TeksiKu app, but the company will also set up electronic kiosks in strategic locations (for example, in airports and stations within the rail network) to enable those without the app to easily secure a ride

    Good Should use mercedes eqs‚Ä¶ Add a comment

    ['car', 'august', 'taxi', 'say', 'teksiku']



  • 8BITDO LAUNCHES THE WIRELESS ULTIMATE GAMING CONTROLLER | HYPEBEAST

    https://hypebeast.com/2022/8/8bitdo-wireless-ultimate-gaming-controller-release

    08/31/2022, 12:08

    45.45% Shortened!

    If you‚Äôre looking for a new controller to update your gaming setup, 8BitDo has now updated its sleek Ultimate Controller design with the introduction of new wireless models as well

    Now available in either Bluetooth or 2.4GHz wireless configurations or a traditional wired model

    The new lineup carries an Xbox-styled layout with a left analog stick and the A-B-X-Y buttons on either side while a right analog stick and left-handed D-pad sit lower in the center

    As for compatibility, the Bluetooth version will link up with Windows PCs and the Nintendo Switch while the 2.4GHz variant works with Windows, Android and Raspberry Pi platforms

    The wired version will then connect with Windows, Android, Raspberry Pi and the Switch

    Available in black, white and pink, prices for 8BitDo‚Äôs new Ultimate Controller range from $35 USD to $70 USD and deliveries are expected for October.

    ['new', 'controller', 'update', 'game', '8bitdo']

  • AT DATARAN MERDEKA, MALAYSIANS TURN OUT IN DROVES TO CELEBRATE NATIONAL DAY

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/31/at-dataran-merdeka-malaysians-turn-out-in-droves-to-celebrate-national-day/25681

    08/31/2022, 11:11

    80.65% Shortened!

    With the theme Keluarga Malaysia Teguh Bersama (Malaysian Family Strong Together), this year‚Äôs historic day celebration is meaningful in expressing the gratitude and pride of the country's pluralistic society who gathered at the main location of the National Day celebration, with most of them arriving as early as 4.30am to witness the event

    The celebrative atmosphere was enlivened when the theme song for the event, Keluarga Malaysia Teguh Bersama (Malaysian Family Strong Together) echoed in the air

    Leading the segment on nationhood was a parade by 60 cadet officers from the Military Training Academy, National Defence University of Malaysia (UPNM) and trainee cadets from the Royal Malaysia Police Training Centre carrying huge flags

    For the national security segment, the Malaysian Armed Forces (ATM) started the parade with a demonstration on rescuing hostages by the elite force, followed by ATM assets

    Air assets belonging to the Malaysian security forces were also displayed in an air show, including the A400M and C-130 Hercules belonging to the Royal Malaysian Air Force (RMAF)

    The theme song for Keluarga Malaysia, composed by Jerry and lyrics by Annuar, who is also the Chairman of the 2022 National Day and Malaysia Day Steering Committee, concluded today‚Äôs performance

    ['malaysian', 'national', 'day', 'malaysia', 'celebration']

    The celebrative atmosphere was enlivened when the theme song for the event, Keluarga Malaysia Teguh Bersama (Malaysian Family Strong Together) echoed in the air

    Leading the segment on nationhood was a parade by 60 cadet officers from the Military Training Academy, National Defence University of Malaysia (UPNM) and trainee cadets from the Royal Malaysia Police Training Centre carrying huge flags

    Therefore, you can have more than one player near a totem at a time, so long as one of them holds the buff

    Once the player in the middle has identified which plate is first, they should step off, and then start the sequence

    The person on the first plate relates the next plate to the rest of the team, and the remaining plate is last

    This is the only player who can claim the buff, and they need to head to the green platform along with another player, who has to stand on that pressure plate for the time being

    If your plate is not one of the active ones, be sure to stay off it, or everyone on a plate will take damage

    The first player detonates their bomb and then returns to the aura to do damage to Oryx

    According to political analyst and associate professor Kartini Aboo Talib @ Khalid, MCA and MIC need not distance itself from Umno despite its plan to rally around Najib

    She explained that BN was not monolithic in nature and even Umno members were not all behind Najib

    ['umno', 'najib', 'election', 'appeal', 'mca']

    ‚ÄúIronically, some candidates of these two parties welcomed and posed with Najib during the state campaigns, and even attributed their victories partly to Najib‚Äôs Bossku appeal

    ‚ÄúBoth parties are quiet about Najib in prison while Umno is using Najib as their icon despite him being in prison now

    The briefing, chaired by Umno president Datuk Seri Dr Ahmad Zahid Hamidi, saw loud cries for the dissolution of Parliament and there were boos whenever the Prime Minister‚Äôs name was mentioned

    While the current parliamentary term ends in July, Umno has been pressuring for the polls to be held as soon as possible

    On Monday, fellow vice-president Datuk Seri Mahdzir Khalid also said claims that Ismail Sabri was given an ultimatum during the meeting was aimed at splitting Umno

    Umno deputy president Datuk Seri Mohamad Hasan, meanwhile, has said the Prime Minister has given his commitment to call for the election by the end of this year.

  • AMD RYZEN 9 7950X VS. INTEL CORE I9-12900K: SPEC COMPARISON

    https://www.digitaltrends.com/computing/ryzen-9-7950x-vs-intel-core-i9-12900k/

    08/31/2022, 07:11

    85.71% Shortened!

    When the Intel Core i9-12900K came out in late 2021, it was Intel‚Äôs first true flagship CPU since its 2018 Core i9-9900K

    Clock speed is also difficult to compare as AMD and Intel CPUs don‚Äôt boost the same way

    AMD did provide us with a Geekbench 5.4 benchmark, though only for single-thread

    Ryzen 7000 resolves all of that by bringing support for all of these features, and in some ways, AMD is actually doing it better than Intel

    AMD also has slightly better DDR5 support, with the highest supported clock speed being 5,200MHz on AMD boards, while Intel boards go up to just 4,800MHz

    Finally, AMD is adding AVX-512 support, which is an extended CPU instruction set that helps improve performance

    ['intel', 'core', '12900k', 'cpu', 'amd']

    When the Intel Core i9-12900K came out in late 2021, it was Intel‚Äôs first true flagship CPU since its 2018 Core i9-9900K

    Clock speed is also difficult to compare as AMD and Intel CPUs don‚Äôt boost the same way

    AMD did provide us with a Geekbench 5.4 benchmark, though only for single-thread

    Ryzen 7000 resolves all of that by bringing support for all of these features, and in some ways, AMD is actually doing it better than Intel

    AMD also has slightly better DDR5 support, with the highest supported clock speed being 5,200MHz on AMD boards, while Intel boards go up to just 4,800MHz

    Finally, AMD is adding AVX-512 support, which is an extended CPU instruction set that helps improve performance

  • GOOGLE IS ONLY ALLOWING SOME TO DOWNGRADE FROM ANDROID 13 TO ANDROID 12

    https://www.androidauthority.com/android-13-downgrade-android-12-3202695/

    08/31/2022, 07:08

    60.0% Shortened!

    When Android 13 first started rolling out a few weeks ago, it was discovered that users wouldn‚Äôt be able to go back to Android 12 after updating

    Now, Google is allowing some Pixel owners to go back to Android 12

    As a result, once you updated to Android 13, you were stuck with it

    According to Android Central, Google is now correcting that mistake by releasing ‚ÄúDeveloper Support images‚Äù that will allow its Pixel 6 devices to safely downgrade to an image of Android 12 or 12L

    On Google‚Äôs developer site, the company explains Pixel 6 devices can be rolled back to an Android 12 Developer Support image, but can‚Äôt be rolled back to any other Android 12 images

    In addition to anti-rollback, Android 13 introduced a variety of other security and privacy improvements

    ['android', 'back', 'google', 'pixel', 'developer']

    08/31/2022, 05:10

    76.92% Shortened!

    The iPhone 14 chip will be different than the iPhone 14 Pro chip for the first time.

    The iPhone 14 and iPhone 14 Pro will feature a 6.1-inch display, while the iPhone 14 Max and iPhone 14 Pro Max will feature a 6.7-inch display

    For instance, the iPhone 12 lineup was powered by the A14 chip, while the iPhone 13 lineup is powered by the A15 chip

    That won‚Äôt be the case this year with the iPhone 14 chip

    The iPhone 14 Pro and iPhone 14 Pro Max, however, will see an upgraded processor

    Apple is expected to make a bigger jump from the iPhone 14 to the iPhone 15, but that won‚Äôt happen until 2023.

    ['apple', 'iphone', 'lineup', 'feature', 'chip']

  • LAST SOVIET LEADER MIKHAIL GORBACHEV, WHO ENDED THE COLD WAR, DIES AGED 91

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/world/2022/08/31/mikhail-gorbachev-who-ended-the-cold-war-dies-aged-92--agencies

    08/31/2022, 05:10

    82.86% Shortened!

    Putin said in 2018 he would reverse the collapse of the Soviet Union if he could, news agencies reported at the time

    British Prime Minister Boris Johnson, citing Putin's invasion of Ukraine, said Gorbachev's "tireless commitment to opening up Soviet society remains an example to us all"

    After decades of Cold War tension and confrontation, Gorbachev brought the Soviet Union closer to the West than at any point since World War Two

    Gorbachev won the Nobel Peace Prize in 1990

    Gorbachev - who was briefly deposed in an August 1991 coup by party hardliners - struggled vainly to prevent that collapse

    "The era of Gorbachev is the era of perestroika, the era of hope, the era of our entry into a missile-free world ..

    ['soviet', 'gorbachev', 'moscow', 'war', 'union']

    Gorbachev - who was briefly deposed in an August 1991 coup by party hardliners - struggled vainly to prevent that collapse

    "The era of Gorbachev is the era of perestroika, the era of hope, the era of our entry into a missile-free world ..

    08/31/2022, 05:08

    82.86% Shortened!

    Gorbachev, the last Soviet president, forged arms reduction deals with the United States and partnerships with Western powers to remove the Iron Curtain that had divided Europe since World War Two and bring about the reunification of Germany

    Putin said in 2018 he would reverse the Soviet Union's disintegration if he could, news agencies reported

    WESTERN PARTNERSHIPS After decades of Cold War tension and confrontation, Gorbachev brought the Soviet Union closer to the West than at any point since World War Two

    Gorbachev - who was briefly deposed in an August 1991 coup by party hardliners - struggled vainly to prevent that collapse

    TURBULENT REFORMS "The era of Gorbachev is the era of perestroika, the era of hope, the era of our entry into a missile-free world ..

    Vladimir Rogov, a Russian-appointed official in a part of Ukraine now occupied by pro-Moscow forces, said Gorbachev had "deliberately led the (Soviet) Union to its demise" and called him a traitor

    ['soviet', 'gorbachev', 'war', 'union', 'say']

    That's why the rumors of a Switch-like, Android-based portable from Logitech caught our eye

    A faster chip would make the console cost more, but it would also allow it to capably emulate newer consoles like the Dreamcast, GameCube, PS2, and Wii, whereas many cheap portables top out at the original PlayStation or the Nintendo 64

    The console could probably afford to be more expensive than some of the $100-ish no-name Android consoles out there, but it would ideally be quite a bit cheaper than x86-based handhelds like the Steam Deck

    08/31/2022, 04:08

    Watch Of The Week The Fine German Watch That Taught Me To Appreciate Asymmetry

    It would seem that Bulgari considers the Aluminum line ripe for collaboration

    It seems like only yesterday that the rubber-bezel watch was given the Ducati treatment

    But time marches ever onward and so do the folks at Bulgari, so here we are with a new collaboration that brings together the time-and-date Aluminum watch with the chrome-heavy aesthetics of Japanese artist Hajime Sorayama.¬† The watch features a silver-toned dial and "propeller-shaped" hour-markers that are designed to recall Sorayama's work that channels the design of cars and planes from the '30s and '40s

    Dial text reads "Bulgari" in the top half and "Sorayama" at the bottom half to ward off any confusion as to whether or not this is indeed a collaboration.¬† Sorayama said of the watch, "When I was asked to be part of this collaboration, I developed three main design elements

    Sorayama's dream-come-true watch is powered by caliber BVL 192, a mechanical self-winding caliber found in the Aluminum GMT

    ['protect', 'watch', 'second', 'policy', 'cover']

    The iPhone 14 Pro and ‚ÄåiPhone 14 Pro‚Äå Max are expected to replace the iPhone 13 Pro and ‚ÄåiPhone 13 Pro‚Äå Max at next week's Apple event, but how different are the two successive "Pro" iPhone generations rumored to be? In 2021, Apple unveiled the ‚ÄåiPhone 13 Pro‚Äå as the successor to the popular iPhone 12 Pro, with ProMotion displays, improved rear cameras, the A15 Bionic chip, and more

    The larger camera plateau is naturally more noticeable on the 6.1-inch ‚ÄåiPhone 14 Pro‚Äå than it is on the 6.7-inch ‚ÄåiPhone 14 Pro‚Äå Max

    While the difference between the ‚ÄåiPhone 12 Pro Max‚Äå and ‚ÄåiPhone 13 Pro‚Äå Max's camera arrays are minor, the difference between the ‚ÄåiPhone 12‚Äå Pro and ‚ÄåiPhone 13 Pro‚Äå is significant

    Currently, the ‚ÄåiPhone 13 Pro‚Äå and ‚ÄåiPhone 13 Pro‚Äå Max feature 6GB of LPDDR 4X memory

    This is a reduction of 0.68¬µm compared to the ‚ÄåiPhone 13 Pro‚Äå and ‚ÄåiPhone 13 Pro‚Äå Max

    The ‚ÄåiPhone 13 Pro‚Äå's Ultra Wide features 1.0¬µm pixels, while the ‚ÄåiPhone 14 Pro‚Äå is expected to boast 1.4¬µm pixels

    Currently, the ‚ÄåiPhone 13 Pro‚Äå and ‚ÄåiPhone 13 Pro‚Äå Max feature 6GB of LPDDR 4X memory

    This is a reduction of 0.68¬µm compared to the ‚ÄåiPhone 13 Pro‚Äå and ‚ÄåiPhone 13 Pro‚Äå Max

    The ‚ÄåiPhone 13 Pro‚Äå's Ultra Wide features 1.0¬µm pixels, while the ‚ÄåiPhone 14 Pro‚Äå is expected to boast 1.4¬µm pixels

    ['iphone', 'pro', 'expect', 'apple', 'camera']

  • DIABLO IMMORTAL SEASON 4 UPDATE WILL TEASE GAME'S FIRST "MAJOR" UPDATE

    https://www.gamespot.com/articles/diablo-immortal-season-4-update-will-tease-games-first-major-update/1100-6506991/

    08/31/2022, 00:10

    73.91% Shortened!

    Players who participate in a new limited-time event will reveal a "hint" about the future of Diablo Immortal

    As outlined in a new blog post, one of those events, the Mists of Cyrangar, will see players taking on "unspeakable horrors" that "lie shrouded in the mist." As players progress the event, Blizzard says mist from the game's event page will slowly clear, revealing a "hint" about Diablo Immortal's first major update

    During the event, all players who are below their server's Paragon level will receive bonus experience until the event ends or they catch up, with Blizzard in the patch notes writing it wants to provide players with an opportunity to "catch up" in preparation for the game's first major update

    What that update will entail is still a mystery for now, but Blizzard has stated in the past that Diablo Immortal's "major updates" will introduce new gameplay features, events, and expand on the game's story

    Diablo Immortal proved controversial upon release for its various microtransactions

    The game has reportedly earned more than $100 million since launch, with Blizzard president Mike Ybarra defending Diablo Immortal's monetization model in a recent interview

    ['player', 'new', 'event', 'diablo', 'immortal']

    8BitDo's premium Ultimate Wired Controller line now also includes a fancy charging dock

    The controller is available to preorder in white and black models at Amazon

    This PC and mobile version of the Ultimate Controller--available in black or white--contains most of the features that the Switch model is equipped with

    The big difference with this 8BitDo Ultimate Controller is that it doesn't include a charging dock and needs to be physically tethered to your Switch, PC, or mobile device via USB

    The Galaxy Z Fold 3, Flip 3, and Fold 2 all survived this same test

    Samsung hasn‚Äôt changed anything in terms of dust resistance on the Galaxy Z Fold 4, or really any of its foldables since 2020‚Äôs Galaxy Z Flip

    ‚ÄúA price increase in the U.S

    In an email to Polygon, Ahmad noted that the United States is the largest console market, and one of the most competitive, which makes a price increase there riskier

    ‚ÄúIf they have a chance to raise price in the U.S., [Sony] probably will do so, but raising price is SUCH a dumb idea,‚Äù Pachter said in an email

    ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs likely that Sony increased the price of the console to keep hardware profitability stable and hit targets set for the [fiscal year],‚Äù Ahmad added

    ['say', 'sony', 'year', 'price', 'email']

    However, the Ultimate Controller will offer a suite of premium features you‚Äôd typically find on a controller that costs twice as much

    You‚Äôll be able to save your preferences to up to three separate profiles, stored independently on the controller's hardware
